text:
@GreggJarrett @realDonaldTrump Who do you think you're winning over with this rhetoric? 
✔The @GOP's bleeding voters 
✔You're encouraging the remaining supporters to mass protest amid a #COVID19 pandemic!
✔In 2 weeks COVID cases will increase as will the deaths. Can you REALLY afford to lose more voters? https://t.co/xIyrxxYN2I

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
